resources.string: The app searches automatically based on your location and café rating.
Note: the app needs location permission in order to function.
Click the list button to see the found cafés.
Click on radius icon to change the search radius ( [m] ).
Yellow markers represent locations with below average rating.
Green markers represent locations with above average rating.

string.name: noteText2
string.i: (average rating is calculated by the combination of found locations)
